abstract: William Diamond, designer of bold, theatrical interiors, dies at age 63.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Diamond, with his design partner Anthony Baratta, created vividly hued rooms that married antiques and contemporary pieces; their creations were often featured in home design magazines.

headline.main: William Diamond, Designer of Wildly Colored Interiors, Dies at 63

snippet: Mr. Diamond, with his design partner Anthony Baratta, created vividly hued rooms that married antiques and contemporary pieces; their creations were often featured in home design magazines.
